FuncDef: This command adds an IPv6 address prefix to an existing IPv6 address prefix match list.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IPv6 address prefix written as hexadecimal numbers separated by colons with host bits set to 0. One string of zeros can be omitted, so 2001:db8::700:0:217A is equivalent to 2001:db8:0:0:0:700:0:217A. Values-x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
Specifies the length of the entered IPv6 prefix. Values-1 to 128.
